name: Underbelly (underbelly-if)
description:
You play as one of two monster-hunters-for-hire in the tiny mining town of Fairglass, Oregon. When an unexplained accident rocks the town to its core, it’s up to you and your friends to solve the mystery and save the town... before it’s too late.

🔦 FEATURES

  • Fully customizable MC, including appearance, gender and pronouns
  • A squad of friends to solve the mystery, all of whom you can romance
  • Build (or destroy) your relationships, and the relationships of others 
  • warning: will include descriptions of violence and gore

🔦 ROS

  • MADELINE BERG (F): your right hand woman, fellow monster hunter, and best friend. Inseparable for years, your bond could never be broken. You two opened your monster hunting business about four years ago. 
  • NICHOLAS BAQUIRAN (M): the town’s exorcist. Your self-described ‘rival,’ though you both know that’s not true. He frequently collaborates with you and Madeline.
  • FAIZAH O’CONNOR (F): the town’s designated historian. Her deep knowledge of the mine and town’s past will prove to be invaluable. 
  • LUCAS DAMICO (M): a biologist from Portland, called in for his expertise in genetics and anatomy. Very new to the whole monster hunting scene, and often feels in over his head.

IF dev blog: https://underbelly-if.tumblr.com/
